General
 
Rules
 
and
 
Regulations
 
for
 
School
1.
Attendance
 
and
 
Punctuality
○
Students
 
must
 
attend
 
school
 
daily
 
and
 
arrive
 
on
 
time.
○
Parents
 
should
 
notify
 
the
 
school
 
of
 
absences
 
or

in
 
advance.

Code
○

must
 
wear
 
the
 
prescribed
 
school
 
uniform.
○

should
 
be
 
neat,
 
clean,
 
and
 
appropriate
 
for
 
school
 
activities.
3.

and
 
Discipline
○

must
 
show
 
respect
 
to
 
teachers,
 
staff,
 
and
 
fellow
 
students.
○
Bullying,
 
harassment,
 
and
 
any
 
form
 
of
 
violence
 
are
 
strictly
 
prohibited.
○

must

classroom
 
rules
 
and
 
school
 
policies.

honestly.
